summary: Now my player character created as a follower by Skykix!!!
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][size=2][b]

[size=6]Salina - A Nordic Follower[/size][/b]


[img width=867,height=493]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/86903-0-1506125752.jpg[/img]


[b]Description:[/b]

She is a nordic follower by [/size][/font][font=Verdana][size=2][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1020554/?]Skykix[/url][/size] from my player character preset I have developed during my modding. Skykix was so very kindly to create her with my little assistent, which mods have to be needed for her to realize it near hundred percent to my original.
All credits for his excellant work goes to him!!! And if you are interested in his other great modding stuff, then
visit his profile and download what you like and endorse him, please.


[b]Details:[/b]

Name: Salina
Voice: FemaleEvenToned
Race: Nord
Body: UNP
Height: 1
Weight: 100
Level-System: Level with with player from Level 6 - 250
Protection: Essential
Assistance: Helps Friends and Allies
Fighting-Style (Weapons and Armor): She prefer a bow or/and a Greatsword and light armor!!!
Combat Style and Class: Slight changed and custom with CreationKit
Perks: LightFoot, PowerShot, Ranger, Barbarian, PowerBashPerk, DeepWounds, Overdraw, QuickShot, TrickShot, CriticalShot
Default Weapons and Armor: Steel Dagger, Imperial Bow with Steel Arrows and no armor!!! She wears Prisoner clothing and footwraps, which is not very stylish, but you can change her outfit to your like!!!
Location: Battle Born Farm near Whiterun ... where she is working on the field there, you can recruit her!!!

[b]Note:

[/b]Please accept and understand, that she is and will be with UNP body only!!!
There will not be other options from our side be possible, I am so sorry!!!


[b]Installation:[/b]
[b]
[/b]She is a standalone follower and nothing will be needed!!!


[b]Recommandation:[/b]

[font=Verdana][size=2][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1020554/?]Skykix[/url][/size][/size][/font] has created many other great modding stuff you can find under his profile here on NEXUS!!!
But don't forget to endorse every mod(s) you like from him after download and installation, please!!!


[b]Credits:[/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015]BodySlide, Outfit Studio[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]CBBE Body[/url] by Ousnius and Caliente
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99
UNP Body created with BodySlide
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25588/?]Women of Skyrim female face textures[/url] by zzjay
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] by Hello Santa
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url] by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url] by Hvergelmir
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?]Natural Eyes[/url] by nevenbridge
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36249/?]Mature Skin new lips[/url] by maevan zzjay
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]RaceMenu[/url] by Expired
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?]UNP Minidresses Collection[/url] by Tiwa44

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1020554/?]Skykix[/url] for Salina's creation!!!

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/40101665/?][font=Verdana][size=2]bchick3[/size][/font][/url] for portation to SSE!!!

and
[url=http://bethesda.net/de/dashboard]Bethesda[/url] for the great game and the original vanilla parts, which also used for her!!!


[b]Tools:[/b]

[url=http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope]Nifskope[/url] by corwin
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40494/?]NPC Nif Merge[/url] by Turulo
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit[/url] by ElminsterAU


[b]ENB-Preset:[/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41482/?]Rudy ENB[/url] by Rudy102


[b]Support:[/b]

Not easy, because I am not the modder, but I want to try it!!!


[b]Thanksgivings:

[/b]Thanks to all who made this possible now!!!
And a very special thanks goes to [size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1020554/?]Skykix[/url][/size] the creator of this mod and his first made screenshots of her!!!
A special thanks to [font=Verdana][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/40101665/?][font=Verdana][size=2]bchick3[/size][/font][/url][/size][/font] for portation to SSE you can find [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/12476/?]here[/url]!!!


If you like this mod, endorse her and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/addimage/?id=86903]add some screenshots[/url] of her, [font=Verdana][size=2]please[/size][/font]!?!




[/size][/font][/center]
author: Skykix and Astra2000
